name: Add new Edusign professors to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as new rows
description: Every time a new professor is created in Edusign, Make will automatically add that professor to a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FBrlN53s_yozKnm1IeX6sR0rIG3m5Zz9i6_ygoibXDw/edit?usp=sharing).
